title: Oscar Peterson - Hello Herbie (1969) @320kbps
description:
MP3/320kbps

This 1969 Oscar Peterson date finds guitarist Herb Ellis sitting in with the pianist and his rhythm section (bassist Sam Jones and drummer Bobby Durham) for a gloriously stretched-out session. Many of the compositions are based on simple blues progressions, but the sense of cool swing and bop pyrotechnics from Ellis and Peterson approximates the magic the two leaders shared together in the &#039;50s (when Ellis was the regular guitarist for Peterson&#039;s then-bassless trio). Though HELLO HERBIE is not an essential addition to the Peterson catalogue, the scads of fine playing here will surely please fans of either musician.

Personnel:
Oscar Peterson (piano)
Herb Ellis (guitar)
Sam Jones (bass instrument)
Bob Durham (drums)

Track Listing:
1.Naptown Blues
2.Exactly Like You
3.Day By Day
4.Hamp&#039;s Blues
5.Blues For HG
6.Seven Come Eleven
